RUNNING.description: Number of apps in running state at a point in time

ACCEPTED.description: Number of apps in accepted state at a point in time

FINISHED.description: Number of apps in finished state at a point in time

NEW_SAVING.description: Number of apps in saving state at a point in time

NEW.description: Number of apps in new state at a point in time

total.description: Total number of nodes at a point in time

active.description: Number of active nodes at a point in time

unhealthy.description: Number unhealthy nodes at a point in time

lost.description: Number of lost nodes at a point in time

rebooted.description: Number of rebooted nodes at a point in time

decommissioned.description: Number of decommissioned nodes at a point in time

ResourceResponse.description: Timeseries of resource usage in a cluster

date.description: Time in unix epoch time format

ts.description: Time in unix epoch time format

FinishedAppsResponse.description: Timeseries of finished apps in past
